Can you try this test? Launch [this craft](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/14413819/KSP/Docking%20Port%20Test.craft) from the VAB, then see which SRB flies higher. Both have the same mass, with one having a battery as extra mass. Then try it again with the heat shield open.

the old minimum and maximum drag values in part.cfgs (or in moduleparachute or moduleresourceintake) do *literally nothing.* Ignore them.

OK, so I've tried the Master Tao's experiment with one more added variable.
